rows.label: bf07270100_0020
rows.name: I guess you and I are more alike than you thought, chum.

rows.label: bf07270100_0030
rows.name: Though mine was just a surgical procedure.

rows.label: bf07270100_0040
rows.name:
You make it sound so simple.
I'm still trying to wrap my head around it.

rows.label: bf07270100_0050
rows.name:
You know the people of Acedia can trace their
roots back to Judicium?

rows.label: bf07270100_0065
rows.name:
The creators of that Divine Beast weapon thing
from Temperantia?

rows.label: bf07270100_0070
rows.name:
Yeah, them.
They carried out experiments...

rows.label: bf07270100_0080
rows.name:
Fusing Blade and human cells.
Creating Man-Eaters.

rows.label: bf07270100_0100
rows.name: Hey, so they took advantage of Blade regeneration...

rows.label: bf07270100_0110
rows.name: and patched me up with Saika's Core Crystal, right?

rows.label: bf07270100_0120
rows.name: Since I have part of her core in me...

rows.label: bf07270100_0130
rows.name: I'm a Flesh- no, a Blade Eater! Or something.

rows.label: bf07270100_0160
rows.name:
That's right.
That's gotta be why this place is getting to you, too.

rows.label: bf07270100_0170
rows.name:
It's all good.
Let's just push on!
